TopicTitle: Space station Mods in Keeping with Stock

Articles.Content:
Hi

I am trying to build a good space station, but I have hit a wall, I can't find any good mods that are in keeping withthe Stock parts.

can anyone list any good mods,

also I am looking for a good anitina arm, that will swing out from the build,

thanks

Mod, with stock parts? that's gonna be difficult.

Use Kerbal Attatchment System for magnetic clamps etc:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-2-kas-kerbal-attachment-system-v0-1/

Use Infernal Robotics to control the arm:http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/infernal-robotics-v0-6a-parts-pack-1-magic-smoke-industries-ksp-v0-21-1/

Or even use Romfarer's arm:http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/robotic-arms-pack/

RLA stockalike is a great stockalike mod, so is KSPX, but neither do what you want. Go have a look at DMagic Orbital Science. It has some nice extending science instruments which could do the trick visually.
It's not very helpful when you don't say why this, for example, isn't what you want http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64442-Habitat-Pack
